name: Louisa Haist Schwartz
part_bio: Daughter of Barbara (Heist) and August Haist
bio:
SCHWARTZ Jacob SCHWARTZ
died Jan. 28, 1931
aged 69 yrs.
Louisa Haist his wife
died Feb. 1, 1942
aged 70 yrs.
(end)Magdeline SCHWARTZ
born July 16, 1870
died Sept. 27, 1870
aged 2 mos. 11 ds.
(back)Michael SCHWARTZ
born June 29, 1827
died Sept. 22, 1878
aged 51 yrs. 3 mos. 23 dys.
Mary Magdelina
wife of Michael SCHWARTZ
born Feb. 14, 1834
died Mar. 14, 1907
aged 73 yrs. 1 mon.
their son
Michael
born June 2, 1872
died Jan. 29, 1910
aged 37 yrs. 7 mos. 27 dys.
(end)Lydia SCHWARTZ
wife of E.D. WURM
1875-1924
